title: Jane Birkin, actress, singer and style icon, dies at 76
description: The London native had an enduring cultural legacy in France, where she forged a creative and romantic partnership with singer Serge Gainsbourg.

title: Italy welcomed back bears. Now a fatal mauling is dividing the nation.
description: A brown bear named JJ4 killed Andrea Papi in the Italian woods. Some are questioning whether Italy has gone too far in repopulating the predators' numbers.

title: Under Lula, Amazon deforestation is declining. Can he keep it up?
description: There are some signs of success. But Lula's environmental agenda is running into hostile lawmakers and cabinet infighting.

title: Ukraine live briefing: U.K. defense secretary who championed Kyiv to quit; grain deal deadline nears
description: As of Saturday, Russia had not responded to a last-minute attempt to renew the Black Sea Grain Initiative.
